dcterms:creator: P. Caballero
A. Banchs
G. De Veciana
X. Costa-Pérez
dcterms:description: A static slicing-based solution that establishes a resource sharing model between slices as a fisher market and converges this game on a Nash equilibrium.
dcterms:title: Static slicing-based solution

dcterms:creator: K. Suh
S. Kim
Y. Ahn
S. Kim
H. Ju
B. Shim
dcterms:description: A deep Q learning-based algorithm that decides the resource allocation of MECs to multiple slices, addressing the limitations of single-agent models.
dcterms:title: Deep Q learning-based algorithm

dcterms:creator: I. Vila
J. Pérez-Romero
O. Sallent
A. Umbert
dcterms:description: A collaborative multi-agent DRL algorithm that allocates a DRL agent to each slice to define the capacity shares between slices.
dcterms:title: Collaborative multi-agent DRL algorithm

dcterms:creator: J. Feng
Q. Pei
F. R. Yu
X. Chu
J. Du
L. Zhu
dcterms:description: A dynamic network slicing and resource allocation algorithm that optimizes slice request admission in the long term and resource allocation in the short term.
dcterms:title: Dynamic network slicing and resource allocation algorithm

dcterms:creator: N. Van Huynh
D. T. Hoang
D. N. Nguyen
E. Dutkiewicz
dcterms:description: An optimal and fast real-time resource slicing solution using deep dueling neural networks to enhance decision-making in resource allocation.
dcterms:title: Deep dueling architecture

dcterms:creator: S. Gronauer
K. Diepold
dcterms:description: A survey on Multi-Agent Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient (MADDPG) that discusses its applications and methodologies in resource management.
dcterms:title: Multi-agent Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient (MADDPG)
